summary.description:
A Circulating miRNA-Based Scoring System Established by WGCNA to Predict Colon Cancer.

Introduction:Circulation microRNAs (miRNAs) perform as potential diagnostic biomarkers of many kinds of cancers. This study is aimed at identifying circulation miRNAs as diagnostic biomarkers in colon cancer. Methods:We conducted a weighted gene coexpression network analysis (WGCNA) in miRNAs to find out the expression pattern among circulation miRNAs by using a "WGCNA" package in R. Correlation analysis was performed to find cancer-related modules. Differentially expressed miRNAs (DEmiRs) in colon cancer were identified by a "limma" package in R. Hub gene analysis was conducted for these DEmiRs in the cancer-related modules by the "closeness" method in cytoscape software.
